reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater has a great fit, with one mentioning it's cropped just below the waist.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and Cozy Sweater!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I absolutely love this sweater! The color is stunning and just as advertised. It is an oversized sweater, that is a little shorter in length, but not cropped length. It is extremely soft. I am 5‘2“, weigh 100 pounds, and typically a size small. I did size down to an extra small in this for a more fitted look. I would suggest staying true to size unless you want it fitted. It is extremely cozy and stretchy. The quality is excellent and I highly recommend it! Read more
items.author: Tracy Rainey

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars cute!
items.body: super cute! good for work and to go out in! good quality and fits well! good buy! Read more
items.author: stephanie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweater weather!
items.body: I wish I would’ve gotten this sweater in a different color also. I love this sweater. It’s soft and it fits me well. I ordered a medium and it still has a nice oversized look to it but not too baggy, if that makes sense. Read more
items.author: Kylene Smith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality
items.body: Great quality! Fits perfectly Read more
items.author: jammie joostberns

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit
items.body: Great fit, I love the mock neck on this and the crop isn’t tooo crazy Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pulling?
items.body: Good price but I’m afraid it will probably pill. Read more
items.author: WC rafter

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely black mock turtle sweater
items.body: Just as described and fits perfectly. Read more
items.author: Patricia S. Johnson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cropped just below waist
items.body: Nice material. Not heavy at all. A bit lower than waist level so petfdct for us shorties trying to hide the middle (IYKYK). Color is more of a bronze brown instead of chocolate. Purchased to wear with skirts! 5/5! Read more
items.author: Cawfee

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Brown, Beige, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
